Available Components

Volta brings over 30 reusable components built to provide iconography, dropdowns, input groups, navigation, alerts, and much more. Let's analyze the customization possibilities of each component. Values written in bold are considered default values.

Navbar

Property Value
Identifier .navbar
Coloring .-dark .-light
Positioning .-fixed-top .-fixed-bottom
Modifiers .-opaque

Navbar Nav

Property Value
Identifier .navbar-nav
Coloring .-dark .-light
Positioning .-left, .-right

Navbar Nav Item

Property Value
Identifier .navbar-nav > li > a
Modifiers .-active

Sidebar

Property Value
Identifier .sidebar
Positioning .-left, .-right
Modifiers .-collapsible, .-slideable

Content

Property Value
Identifier .content
Positioning .-with-left-sidebar, .-with-right-sidebar, .-with-top-navbar, .-with-bottom-navbar
Modifiers .-collapsible

Column

Property Value
Identifier .col
Sizing .-xs-{}, .-sm-{}, .-md-{}, .-lg-{}, .-xl-{}

Aside

Property Value
Identifier aside, .aside
Positioning .-with-left-sidebar, .-with-right-sidebar, .-left, .-right
Modifiers .-collapsible

Beside

Property Value
Identifier .beside
Positioning .-left-aside, .-right-aside
Modifiers .-collapsible

Alert

Property Value
Identifier .alert
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger
Border Coloring .-border-primary, .-border-secondary, .-border-info, .-border-success, .-border-warning, .-border-danger
Modifiers .-contrasted

Alert Icon

Property Value
Identifier .alert-icon
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger
Modifiers .-contrasted

Breadcrumb

Property Value
Identifier .breadcrumb
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Button

Property Value
Identifier .btn
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger, .-facebook, .-twitter, .-google-plus, .-dribbble, .-behance, .-flickr, .-linkedin, .-youtube, .-pinterest, .-github, .-tumblr, .-twitch, .-envato
Sizing .-xs, .-sm, .-lg, .-xl
Padding .-wide, .-narrow
Spacing .-hspace, .-vspace
Modifiers .-block

Button Group

Property Value
Identifier .btn-group
Modifiers .-vertical, .-justified

Chart

Property Value
Identifier .chart
Sizing .-xs, .-sm, .-md, .-lg, .-xl

Dropdown Menu

Property Value
Identifier .dropdown-menu
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger
Positioning .-left, .-right

Form

Property Value
Identifier form
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Form Control

Property Value
Identifier .form-control
Sizing .-xs, .-sm, .-md, .-lg, .-xl

Form Control Check

Property Value
Identifier .form-check
Type .-checkbox, .-radio

Image

Property Value
Identifier img
Bordering .-bordered.-dark, .-bordered.-light
Modifiers .-responsive, .-rounded, .-round, .-fluid

List Group

Property Value
Identifier .list-group
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Map

Property Value
Identifier .map
Sizing .-xs, .-sm, .-md, .-lg, .-xl

Modal

Property Value
Identifier .modal
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger

Modal Header

Property Value
Identifier .modal-header
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger

Morph Dropdown

Property Value
Identifier .morph-dropdown
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Morph Dropdown

Property Value
Identifier .morph-dropdown-wrapper
Coloring .-dark, .-light
Positioning .-left, .-right

Notification

Property Value
Identifier .gritter-item
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger, .-facebook, .-twitter, .-google-plus, .-dribbble, .-behance, .-flickr, .-linkedin, .-youtube, .-pinterest, .-github, .-tumblr, .-twitch, .-envato

Page Heading

Property Value
Identifier .page-heading
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Pagination

Property Value
Identifier .pagination
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Pagination Item

Property Value
Identifier .pagination-item
Modifiers .-active

Panel

Property Value
Identifier .panel, .card
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger
Bordering .-bordered, .-bordered-top, .-bordered-right, .-bordered-bottom, .-bordered-left, .-bordered-3d

Progress

Property Value
Identifier .progress
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Progress Bar

Property Value
Identifier .progress .bar
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger

Table

Property Value
Identifier table, .table
Coloring .-dark, .-light
Modifiers .-bordered, .-striped, .-hovered

Table Row

Property Value
Identifier table tr
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger

Table Cell

Property Value
Identifier table td
Modifiers .-user, .-detailed, .-valign-top, .-valign-middle, .-valign-bottom

Tabs

Property Value
Identifier .nav
Coloring .-dark, .-light

Tag

Property Value
Identifier .tag
Coloring .-dark, .-light, .-primary, .-secondary, .-info, .-success, .-warning, .-danger
